旧闻：
2012年国内抵制日货激烈 钓鱼岛前线东海公务员0报考
日媒讽中国海监无人报考

环球时报综合报道： Global times comprehensive 
report:“东海海监船员职位无人报名”，这一传言近日在互联网上被炒得沸沸扬扬。一家公务员辅导机构在报考结束后统计称，中国国家海洋局东海分局和南海分局有7个岗位无人报考，其中包括东海分局6个执法船船员岗位和南海分局1个执法船轮机员岗位。在中日钓鱼岛争端陷入僵局的时刻，一些日本媒体幸灾乐祸地说，用大规模示威叫喊爱国的中国人竟然对海监如此不感兴趣。有日本网民干脆宣称“中国人的爱国心都是假的”。

"The east China sea HaiJian crew position no one application",The rumours on the Internet recently fired an uproar.A civil servant counselling organization in enter oneself for an examination after the end of statistics says,China's state oceanic administration branch of the east China sea and south China sea branches have seven jobs no one to enter oneself for an examination,Including the east China sea six branch law enforcement vessel crew station and south China sea substation 1 law enforcement ship engineer position.In the diaoyu islandtaiwan deadlocked moment,Some Japanese media said Roman holiday,With mass demonstrations cries patriotic Chinese unexpectedly to HaiJian so not interested.A Japanese Internet users simply declared"Chinese patriotism are false".

　　日本2ch论坛10月29日以“中国招收东海海监队队员，但因为害怕被派往钓鱼岛，竟然无人应聘”为题渲染称，在中国刚刚结束的国家公务员招考报名中，国家海洋局东海分局海监队员的应聘者竟然为零。造成这种情况的原因是目前“尖阁列岛”(即中国钓鱼岛及其附属岛屿)的领土争议存在激化可能，大部分人认为太危险。一些日本网民在网上留言称，“中国人的爱国都是嘴巴上的”。
Japan 2 ch BBS on October 29"China recruit the east China sea HaiJian team players,But because of fear of being sent to the diaoyu islands,Had no one to apply for"Issues render said,In China just end of the national public servant recruitment in the application,The state oceanic administration branch of the east China sea HaiJian players candidate unexpectedly is zero.Cause the reason for this is at present"Pointed island pavilion"(That the diaoyu islands and affiliated islands)Territory dispute may exist sharpened,The majority of people believe that it's too dangerous.Some Japanese online message says,"The Chinese patriotic are on the mouth".

　　日本富士电视台报道称，中国海监船的船员招不到人，但日本的海上保安官“人气十足”。由于日本的新闻中每天都报道日本海上保安官在钓鱼岛附近应对中国船只的新闻，今年报考日本海上保安学校和大学的申请者激增，报考人数为16783人，比去年增加了1.5倍，是历史上报考人数最多的一次。《日本经济新闻》称，今年报考海上保安学校的人数为7708人，是去年的2.5倍。

Japan Fuji television reports,China HaiJian ship's crew for no one,But Japan's maritime security officer"popularity".Because of Japan's news reports every day Japan maritime security officer in the diaoyu islands nearby ships deal with China's news,Enter oneself for an examination this year Japan maritime security school and university applicants surge,Enter oneself for an examination the population is 16783 people,Increased 1.5 times than last year,History is one of the largest groups of enter oneself for an examination.[The Japanese economic news]says,This year the number of maritime security enter oneself for an examination the school for 7708 people,Is 2.5 times that of last year.

专家表示，海监薪水相对较低、工作条件艰苦也是原因之一。相比来说，日本海上保安人员薪水相当高，在日本公务员收入中居中上等。


The expert said,HaiJian salary is relatively low/Work hard conditions is also one of the reasons.In contrast,Japan's maritime security personnel salary is quite high,In Japan civil servants income center quality.
